articles.title: Singapore's DBS to buy 13% stake in Chinese bank SZRCB for US$814 million - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: DBS Group has agreed to buy a 13 per cent stake in privately-owned Shenzhen Rural Commercial Bank Corp (SZRCB) for 5.29 billion yuan (US$814.3 million), marking the Southeast Asian lender's biggest acquisition in China.
